translations: [通信] 中继器；[通信] 转发器；重复者

sentences.sentence: Repeater configurable and static routing feature
sentences.translation: 中继器可配置，支持静态路由

sentences.sentence: Such a quantum repeater USES groups of three photons for each bit of the message.
sentences.translation: 这种量子中继器使用一组三个光子对应信息的一个字节。

sentences.sentence: This range can be extended by using SELEX Communications' Repeater Radio Units (Radio Relay).
sentences.translation: 该射程可以通过使用SELEX通信的转发器无线电台(电台继电器)来扩大。
